title: Monitoring Transactions EDC Bank BNI
description: A web application to monitor transaction activities on EDC devices for Bank BNI.
content:
This comprehensive web application provides real-time monitoring of EDC (Electronic Data Capture) transaction activities for Bank BNI.

The application features a modern, responsive dashboard built with React and TypeScript, offering intuitive data visualization through charts and tables. The backend, powered by Golang, ensures high performance and reliability in processing large volumes of transaction data.

Key capabilities include transaction filtering by date range, terminal ID, merchant information, and transaction status. The system also provides detailed analytics, automated alerts for failed transactions, and comprehensive reporting features that help identify trends and potential issues.
features: Automated alert system for failed transactions

title: Web Key Bank Mestika
description: A secure online banking platform for managing accounts, transfers, and payments.
content:
Web Key Bank Mestika is a comprehensive online banking solution designed to provide customers with secure and convenient access to their banking services.

The system is built with a focus on security, implementing multiple layers of authentication including OTP verification, security questions, and encrypted communications.

The platform supports account balance inquiries, fund transfers, bill payments, transaction history viewing, and financial reporting.

title: TMS Mestika
description: A configuration management system for EDC devices.
content:
TMS Mestika is a Terminal Management System designed for managing EDC devices across Bank Mestika's network.

The platform allows centralized remote configuration, firmware management, and device monitoring with full audit trails.

title: Monitoring Transactions Bank OCBC
description: A web-based application to monitor transaction activities on EDC devices for Bank OCBC NISP.

title: Services Transaction Cashlez
description: A microservices-based architecture integrating Cashlez EDC transactions into Odoo.
content: Services Transaction Cashlez is a microservices architecture that processes payment transactions from Cashlez EDC devices and integrates them into Odoo ERP.

title: Yamaha Motor Parts
description: A company profile website for PT Yamaha Motor Parts Manufacturing Indonesia.

title: Hommypay
description: A dashboard application for managing Hommypay payment solutions.
content:
Hommypay Dashboard is a web application to manage and monitor Hommypay payment solutions.

It provides real-time monitoring, reporting, user management, and secure configuration.
